text: Seia () is a municipality in Guarda District in Portugal. The population in 2011 was 24,702,Instituto Nacional de Estatística in an area of 435.69 km².Áreas das freguesias, concelhos, distritos e país Its urban population is about 7,000. Seia was elevated to city status on July 3, 1986. The municipality is situated on the northwestern slope of Serra da Estrela, the highest mountain range in mainland Portugal, with a top height of 1993 meters. The present Mayor is Carlos Filipe Camelo, elected by the Socialist Party. The municipal holiday is July 3. Seia has an annual cinema festival called CineEco that focuses on films with ecological and natural themes. ==Population== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! colspan="9" | Population of Seia Municipality (1801–2004) |- bgcolor="#C0C0C0" | align="center" | 1801 | align="center" | 1849 | align="center" | 1900 | align="center" | 1930 | align="center" | 1960 | align="center" | 1981 | align="center" | 1991 | align="center" | 2001 | align="center" | 2004 |- | align="center" | 9993 | align="center" | 14557 | align="center" | 31929 | align="center" | 31283 | align="center" | 34436 | align="center" | 31352 | align="center" | 30362 | align="center" | 28144 | align="center" | 27574 |} ==Parishes== Vodafone Ski Resort, Serra da Estrela, in Loriga. Administratively, the municipality is divided into 21 civil parishes (freguesias): * Alvoco da Serra * Carragozela e Várzea de Meruge * Girabolhos * Loriga * Paranhos * Pinhanços * Sabugueiro * Sameice e Santa Eulália * Sandomil * Santa Comba * Santa Marinha e São Martinho * Santiago * Sazes da Beira * Seia, São Romão e Lapa dos Dinheiros * Teixeira * Torrozelo e Folhadosa * Tourais e Lajes * Travancinha * Valezim * Vide e Cabeça * Vila Cova à Coelheira ==References== ==External links== *Municipality official website Category:Municipalities of Guarda District
